roux: jp

roux:
紗音さんに濡れ衣を被せようとしてもダメです。あの悪戯の犯人は
あなたです。ヱリカさん。
Lloro - QC/TL: Even if try to frame Shannon-san, it's over for you. Erika-san, you're the culprit of that prank.

roux: それ、気持ちいいでしょう？
Lloro - QC/TL: That feels good, doesn't it?

roux: はい？
Lloro - QC/TL: Excuse me?

roux:

Lloro - QC/TL: "You're the culprit." ...The moment you get to speak those words is the ultimate pleasure for a detective!

roux: もちろん、犯人がその言葉で簡単に屈することはありません。
Lloro - QC/TL: Of course, the culprit won't give in to that phrase so easily.

roux:
それこそ、窮鼠猫を噛むの勢いで反論してくるでしょう。しかし、
それを崩すのがまたいい！
Lloro - QC/TL: As a cornered rat will bite a cat, the culprit will also surely object with all their might. But for me, I'll {i}enjoy{/i} tearing it down once more!
Naegles - QC2: *japanese proverb. the last sentence might be referring to events of previous chapters? not sure what she means

roux:
……つまり、ヱリカさんは模範的な犯人役を演じてくれる、という
ことですよね？
Lloro - QC/TL: ...In other words, Erika-san will play the part of an exemplary culprit. Is that what you're saying?

roux: 貴女が探偵としての究極の悦楽を得られるか……。
Lloro - QC/TL: Can you obtain the ultimate pleasure as a detective...?

roux:

ポコ推理の役になるのか。くっくっく！
Lloro - QC/TL: Or, just before the solution is unveiled, will you assume the role of Inspector So-and-so with your incompetent reasoning? *cackle*cackle*cackle*!

roux:

はないと？
Lloro - QC/TL: Then, Erika-san, let's hear your objection. Why do you say you aren't the culprit?

roux: 非常にシンプルな話です。私にはアリバイがあるからです。
Lloro - QC/TL: It's an exceedingly simple reason. Because I have an alibi.

roux: アリバイ……？
Lloro - QC/TL: Alibi...?

roux:

ペイン料理をいただいたではありませんか。
Lloro - QC/TL: Oh, did you forget? Along with you and the others, didn't I sample Gohda-san's superb renditions on Spanish cuisine?

roux:

加しました。
Lloro - QC/TL: Then, immediately after finishing the meal, I participated in Jessica-san's board game.

roux: その後、遅くまで遊び、皆さんと一緒に２階へ上がったはずです。
Lloro - QC/TL: After we played late into the night, I surely went upstairs with everyone else.

roux:
その間、私はわずかの時間でも、皆さんの前から姿を消したことが
ありましたか？
Lloro - QC/TL: In that time, was there even the briefest moment when I disappeared from everyone's sight?

roux:
確かに、それは鉄壁のアリバイだ。他ならぬ、あたしとずっと一
緒にいたのだから。
Lloro - QC/TL: Certainly, it's a rock-solid alibi. Since she was nowhere other than with me...

roux: いや、………犯行のチャンスはあるわ。
Lloro - QC/TL: No... you did have a chance to commit a crime.

roux: おや。それはどのタイミングで？
Lloro - QC/TL: Oh? At which time would that be?

roux:

が遅れたじゃない。
Lloro - QC/TL: At the very beginning. You were late coming to dinner, saying your hair wasn't ready.

roux:

なっていることを知ってたわ。
Lloro - QC/TL: Also, you knew our room's window was broken and couldn't be locked.

roux:

は十分にあった。
Lloro - QC/TL: The magic circle on the sheets took time to prepare, but there was plenty of time to prepare it in advance.

roux:

で、窓から出て、１階の庇の上を歩き、あたしたちの部屋の窓から
入った！
Lloro - QC/TL: After confirming that we went downstairs to dinner ahead of her, she left through the window, walked on top of the first floor overhang, and entered through the window of our room!

roux: グッド。悪くはありません。
Lloro - QC/TL: <Good>. Not bad at all.

roux: しかし、良くもない。
Lloro - QC/TL: However... not great either.

roux: 反論があるかしら？
Lloro - QC/TL: You have an objection?

roux:

たのは、夕食の早い段階だということになります。
Lloro - QC/TL: But of course. If I did that magic circle prank the way you've said, then it would have happened during the early stage of dinner.

roux: つまり。紗音さんが入室するのは、その後と言う事です。
Lloro - QC/TL: In other words... Shannon-san would be entering the room shortly afterward.

roux:
貴女のベッドが、仰られるような壮絶な状況だったとしたら、彼女
が何事もなく帰ってくると思いますか……？
Lloro - QC/TL: If she found your bed in that wonderfully {i}sublime{/i} state, do you really think she'd return uneventfully?

roux:
私は紗音さんが戻ってきた時。ふざけて、窓から泥棒が入って部屋
を荒らしたりはしていなかったかと聞いたのを覚えていますか？
Lloro - QC/TL: Do you not remember when I jokingly asked Shannon-san, "Has a robber broken into the window or anything?", when she came back?

roux: ……そんなこと……言ったような……。
Lloro - QC/TL: ...I guess... you did say that...

roux: それに対する彼女の返事が、“いいえ、ご安心を”でした。
Lloro - QC/TL: And then, she said word for word, "No. Please be at ease.".

roux:
魅音さんと詩音さんの心臓がタフ過ぎるから、あんな悪戯、下ら

roux:

Lloro - QC/TL: But... if they were guests with normal taste, we would all have screamed, running away from the room in fear of the prank.

roux:

か……？
Lloro - QC/TL: Seeing that, could someone really say, "No. Please be at ease."?

roux: そ、それはきっと……、考えられることは、貴女と紗音さんが、

Lloro - QC/TL: {umi_red}Shannon-san and I are not conspiring together in any way.{/umi_red}

roux:

roux: 根拠を示すことなく、真実を語る言葉に聞こえた……。
Lloro - QC/TL: They were words that I knew spoke the truth even without it being shown...

roux:
よって、私が紗音さんに予め因果を含め、魔法陣の悪戯を見て見ぬ
フリをしろ、などと言い含めたことはあり得ないということです。
Lloro - QC/TL: Therefore, me being involved with Shannon-san prior to it, like telling her to pretend not to see the magic circle, or any extension of that scenario, is impossible.

roux:

Lloro - QC/TL: And furthermore, if I were the culprit, my only opportunity to commit the crime would be after Shannon-san had already left the room.

roux:
しかしながら、その時間の全ては、貴女たちと一緒にゲームをして

Lloro - QC/TL: Nonetheless, during that whole time period, I was together playing games with you people, so I have a perfect alibi.

roux: あ、……あたし、紗音さんに直接、聞いてきますっ。

Lloro - QC/TL: Because the Ushiromiya family seems to consider the rights and privacy of their servants deeply, even if you were able to put in a message for Shannon-san while she was out, that message obviously still wouldn't reach her.

roux: お～～い、と朱志香さんが呼びながら戻ってくる。

Lloro - QC/TL: L-Lunch is actually at 12 o'clock! Haah, haah...

す。

Lloro - QC/TL: ...Um, Jessica-san. Do you have a moment?

roux: あたしは朱志香さんを伴い、少しだけ東屋を離れる。

視してるような人だ。
Lloro - QC/TL: On the other hand, Erika-san appeared as though she was pretending to read, constantly observing each move people made.

roux:

Lloro - QC/TL: Going too far away would make it suspicious. I'll move away just enough so that our voices can't be heard.

roux: あの朱志香さん。……今日から、紗音さんはお休みなんですか？
Lloro - QC/TL: Um, Jessica-san... Is Shannon-san going to be off work from today?

Lloro - QC/TL:

Lloro - QC/TL: ...Uhh. My folks are, y'know, pretty strict...

roux: やはり、ヱリカさんの言っていた通りのようだ。

roux:
紗音さんは明日までお休み。

し、一切の連絡を取らないらしい。
Lloro - QC/TL: Shannon-san is on leave until tomorrow. And since the Ushiromiya family highly values the privacy of their servants, it's looking like I won't be able to get one call in.

ルなんだよ……。ゴメンな。
Lloro - QC/TL: Even if they knew where she was, they wouldn't let you talk with her. They have rules like that... Sorry about it.

roux: あ、……いえ。こちらこそすみません……。
Lloro - QC/TL: Ah... no. I'm sorry for asking...

roux:
それでも連絡が取りたくなるような嘘が、ぱっと思い付けない。

Lloro - QC/TL: I can't come up with a lie on the spot to make her want to let me get in contact. ...It seemed like it was impossible to call her.

roux: ……仮に知っていても、話さない。…………あ。
Lloro - QC/TL: ...Even if they knew, they wouldn't let you speak. ......Ah.

roux:
……見ても、見ていないというのが、使用人のお作法、……とい
うことはないだろうか？
Lloro - QC/TL: ...Whether a servant sees something or doesn't see something is a duty of theirs... isn't that right?

roux: 朱志香さん。……とても当り前な話かもしれませんけど……。
Lloro - QC/TL: Jessica-san. ...This might be obvious, but...

roux:
例えばですよ？　使用人の人がベッドメイクか何かで客室に入った

roux: そりゃあるさ！　源次さん曰く、使用人は家具なんだとさ。

Lloro - QC/TL: Furniture does not start conversation. It silently performs its task. It does not needlessly make its presence known.

roux:

roux: 客のプライベートと判断するか、否かの問題だと思うぜ。

あたしたちが夕食に降りた直後しかありえない。
